eventDecorators.name: GovernanceUpdated
eventDecorators.description: event for signaling salvaged non-token assets.

eventDecorators.name: PendingGovernanceUpdated
eventDecorators.description: event for signaling salvaged non-token assets.

eventDecorators.name: TransmuterPeriodUpdated
eventDecorators.description: event for signaling salvaged non-token assets.

functionDecorators.name: acceptGovernance
functionDecorators.description: Accepts the role as governance. This function reverts if the caller is not the new pending governance.

functionDecorators.name: bufferInfo
functionDecorators.description: Gets info on the buffer This function is used to query the contract to get the latest state of the buffer.

returnDecorators.name: _toDistribute
returnDecorators.description: the amount ready to be distributed.

returnDecorators.name: _deltaBlocks
returnDecorators.description: the amount of time since the last phased distribution.

functionDecorators.name: claim
functionDecorators.description: claims the base token after it has been transmuted This function reverts if there is no realisedToken balance.

functionDecorators.name: distribute
functionDecorators.description: Distributes the base token proportionally to all waToken stakers. This function is meant to be called by the Alchemist contract for when it is sending yield to the transmuter. Anyone can call this and add funds, idk why they would do that though...

parameterDecorators.name: origin
parameterDecorators.description: the account that is sending the tokens to be distributed.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of base tokens to be distributed to the transmuter.

returnDecorators.description: displays the user's share of the pooled waTokens.

functionDecorators.name: exit
functionDecorators.description: Transmutes and unstakes all waTokens This function combines the transmute and unstake functions for ease of use.

functionDecorators.name: forceTransmute
functionDecorators.description: Executes transmute() on another account that has had more base tokens allocated to it than waTokens staked. The caller of this function will have the surlus base tokens credited to their tokensInBucket balance, rewarding them for performing this action This function reverts if the address to transmute is not over-filled.

parameterDecorators.name: toTransmute
parameterDecorators.description: address of the account you will force transmute.

functionDecorators.name: getMultipleUserInfo
functionDecorators.description: Gets the status of multiple users in one call This function is used to query the contract to check for accounts that have overfilled positions in order to check who can be force transmuted.

parameterDecorators.name: from
parameterDecorators.description: the first index of the userList.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: the last index of the userList returns the userList with their staking status in paginated form.

functionDecorators.name: setPendingGovernance
functionDecorators.description: Sets the pending governance. This function reverts if the new pending governance is the zero address or the caller is not the current governance. This is to prevent the contract governance being set to the zero address which would deadlock privileged contract functionality.

functionDecorators.name: setTransmutationPeriod
functionDecorators.description: set the TRANSMUTATION_PERIOD variable sets the length (in blocks) of one full distribution phase.

functionDecorators.name: setWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: This function reverts if the caller is not governance.

parameterDecorators.name: _toWhitelist
parameterDecorators.description: the account to mint tokens to.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of waTokens to stake.

functionDecorators.name: transmute
functionDecorators.description: Converts the staked waTokens to the base tokens in amount of the sum of pendingdivs and tokensInBucket once the waToken has been converted, it is burned, and the base token becomes realisedTokens which can be recieved using claim() reverts if there are no pendingdivs or tokensInBucket.

functionDecorators.name: transmuteAndClaim
functionDecorators.description: Transmutes and claims all converted base tokens. This function combines the transmute and claim functions while leaving your remaining WaTokens staked.

functionDecorators.name: transmuteClaimAndWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Transmutes, claims base tokens, and withdraws waTokens. This function helps users to exit the transmuter contract completely after converting their WaTokens to the base pair.

functionDecorators.name: unstake
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws staked waTokens from the transmuter This function reverts if you try to draw more tokens than you deposited.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of waTokens to unstake.

functionDecorators.name: userInfo
functionDecorators.description: Gets the status of a user's staking position. The total amount allocated to a user is the sum of pendingdivs and inbucket.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the user you wish to query. returns user status.
